definition: willful lack of care and attention, give little or no attention to
details:
noun
- willful lack of care and attention
= synonyms: neglect
- lack of attention and due care
= synonyms: neglect
verb
- give little or no attention to
= synonyms: neglect, ignore
- bar from attention or consideration
= synonyms: discount
- refuse to acknowledge
= synonyms: cut, snub, ignore, turn a blind eye, disavow
